title: These are the features we expect to see with the 2022 MacBook Air
content:
There’s a new MacBook Air just around the corner. At least, rumors and analysts believe Apple will introduce a redesigned new MacBook in 2022. With that, there are some features that are very likely to be available with this new generation of Mac. Read on as we round up what we expect to see on the 2022 MacBook Air.

more…

The post These are the features we expect to see with the 2022 MacBook Air appeared first on 9to5Mac.
